ModMetaData.name: RMC019.电路断路器
ModMetaData.author: Ratys
ModMetaData.description:
英文名：RT Fuse
Researchable (RT Mods research tab) electric fuses to mitigate short circuits. When placed anywhere on a power network, each fuse will safely discharge up to three of network's batteries, mitigating or preventing the explosion. 新增简易熔断器与电路断路器以保护电路，每个保险丝将安全地释放多达三个网络电池，以减轻或防止因短路发生的爆炸。
Does not require a new colony to add or remove (might throw a one-time error). 可以安全新增或移除（可能引发一次性的红字）
